程序包 com.giisoo.framework.web

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    LifeListener  
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Controller
    load module, default module
    DummyModel
    default model for which model has not found
    GClassLoader  
    GiisooContextListener  
    GiisooServlet  
    Language
    language data which located at /modules/[module]/i18n/
    Model
    all web api base class
    Model.HTTPMethod  
    Model.NameValue  
    Model.PathMapping  
    Module
    module includes: a module.ini, a group of model/view/images/css/js/language, etc. and it will handle the request, if not found the handler in the module, then will let the parent to handle it the module organized as a chain, the home module will handler first, if found then stop, else parent or parent's parent this purpose of module is reuse the module with only changing of configuration file
    PageLabel  
    PageLink  
    Paging  
    QueryString  
    Sitemap
    create sitemap utility
    TemplateLoader  
    Widget  
  • 注释类型概要 
    注释类型 说明
    Path
    used to define a Web api, for each commented api, the framework will pass "login", "method" Object as "default" parameters
    Require 已过时 
    URIMapping
